description: Jessy, a conservationist, has access to 10 units of unused land. She can offer some or all units to Bob, a wildlife manager, to integrate into a sanctuary. Each unit used increases the sanctuary's capacity threefold. Bob then decides how many extended areas to allocate back to Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_none: offer 0 units of land for expansion
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_low: offer 3 units of land for expansion
trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: offer all units of land for expansion

trustee_behavior_choices.return_none: allocate 0 extended areas back to donor
trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: allocate 40-50% of extended areas back to donor
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: allocate more than 80% of extended areas back to donor
